mcq.statement: Choose the sentence with correct punctuation:

options.a: Please bring the following items a pencil, a notebook, and a calculator.
options.b: Please bring the following items: a pencil, a notebook, and a calculator.
options.c: Please bring the following items; a pencil, a notebook, and a calculator.
options.d: Please bring the following items- a pencil, a notebook, and a calculator.
